column1: Smoque BBQ////Ordered the rib combo--both St. Louis style and baby back ribs. Definitely preferred the quality of meat of the St. Louis style
column2: as was recommended on the menu. I really liked the sauce
column3: much tangier than I'm used to
column5: if not sometimes a little too tangy. Good coleslaw
column8: decent prices. I was not impressed with the baby back ribs
column9: have had better at family barbecues.
